#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<fstream>
#include<iomanip>
#include<bitset>
#include<deque>
#include<queue>
#include<string>
#include<map>
#include<cstring>
#include<sstream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
	int T, N;
	scanf("%d %d", &T, &N);
	for (int t = 0; t < T; t++)
	{
		int x, y;
		map<int, int> m;
		scanf("%d %d", &x, &y);
		while (x != 0)
		{
			m[x]++;
			x /= 2;
		}
		while (y != 0)
		{
			m[y]++;
			y /= 2;
		}
		for (map<int, int>::iterator i = m.begin(); i != m.end(); i++)
		{
			if (i->second == 2)
				printf("%d ", i->first);
		}
		printf("\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
